title: Soil Amendment Myths | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Identify potential soil amendments and their appropriate use.
subtasks: Differentiate between suitable and unsuitable soil amendments for Wyoming's gardening conditions.
Explain the purpose and application of gypsum in soil amendment.
Highlight the importance of soil testing before applying soil conditioners.
Discuss the role of organic matter in soil improvement.
Emphasize the limitations of lime in Wyoming's gardening context.
Encourage consultation with local Extension educators for soil management advice.
